mapper.select: SELECT hms.id, hm. NAME AS h_name, hm.describes, hms.submit_state, hm.path, u.name AS u_name FROM home_work_state AS hms LEFT JOIN home_work AS hm ON hms.home_work_id = hm.id LEFT JOIN USER AS u ON u.id = hms.user_id WHERE hms.student_id IN ( SELECT ts.id FROM teacher_student AS ts WHERE ts.number =#{number} AND delete_flag = '1' )

SELECT hms.id, hms.submit_state, hms.submit_path, hm.name AS h_name, ts.name AS s_name FROM home_work_state AS hms LEFT JOIN home_work AS hm ON hm.id = hms.home_work_id LEFT JOIN teacher_student AS ts ON ts.id = hms.student_id WHERE hms.user_id = #{userId} AND hms.delete_flag='1'

SELECT hm.name AS h_name, u.name AS u_name, hms.submit_state, hms.score, hms.remark FROM home_work_state AS hms LEFT JOIN home_work AS hm ON hms.home_work_id = hm.id LEFT JOIN USER AS u ON u.id = hms.user_id WHERE hms.student_id IN ( SELECT ts.id FROM teacher_student AS ts WHERE ts.number =#{number} AND delete_flag = '1' )
